Title: SharePoint Script
Description:
JavaScript Libs for SharePoint 2007, based on jQuery. 
Part I. Access sharepoint list using ajax (through web services), add, update, remove and query list items.
Part II. Control sharepoint list forms (new and edit), hide, readonly the field, get/set the field value, etc.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
JavaScript Libs for SharePoint 2007, based on jQuery.
